document_data.name: Shadow Veil
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shadow veil''''', sometimes known as '''''darkness''''', was an [[invocation]] used by some [[warlock]]s, particularly inexperienced ones, that allowed them to cloak themselves in magical darkness for a brief moment.
document_data.Effects: This spell made the warlock more difficult to detect, allowing them to hide or vanish from sight. The spell was relatively easy to use and warlocks required only a short rest between castings in order to regain the power necessary to cast it.
